title: Unearth
desc:
Post 652
- Can also be played on <:colorless:1106434944261177374> cards
-  When played, search until you find a <:red:1106234051129507932> <:blue:1106234079055200378> <:green:1106234108042031166> or <:yellow:1106234135384699023> card in the play pile below this, and turn each card between this card and that one into any chosen base color
- All players must take the cards they played before, if it is no longer legal to have played that card there
